HI all, i'm trying to put marker in map using gmap api in c#. can anyone hel me? this my code but it does not work, i add reference to GMAP.NET.WindowsForms

 

 GMapControl map = new GMapControl();              

 GMapOverlay objects = new GMapOverlay(map, "stops");            

 GMap.NET.PointLatLng ptl = new GMap.NET.PointLatLng(38.90019921335809, -77.03791383334352);      

GMapMarker mark = new GMapMarker(ptl);              

mark.ToolTipMode = MarkerTooltipMode.Always;              

objects.Markers.Add(mark);            

  map.Overlays.Add(objects);

try GMapMarker mark = new SomeCustomGMapMarker(ptl);

default marker itself is empty
